participant_1.background:
I am in good shape, and I am happy with my weight.
i work at the hospital as a nurse.
My favorite food is campfire stew, because it is warm and filling, and it reminds me of my childhood.
i love chocolate cake with extra frosting.
My work schedule is hectic and I have trouble staying in touch with my family.

participant_2.background:
I practice yoga and meditation to keep fit and calm my mind.
i am the youngest in my family.
i prefer winter.
i make ask a year.
i m currently unemployed so i have time to write.

content.text: Hey
Hi there!
I'm good, thanks! I'm a nurse at the hospital. What do you do for work?
I'm currently unemployed, but I'm a writer. I've written a book a year for the past five years.
Oh wow, that's impressive! What kind of books do you write?
I write mostly fantasy and science fiction. I'm working on a new trilogy right now.
I love fantasy and science fiction! What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is The Lord of the Rings. I read it when I was in high school and it's been my favorite ever since.
I love that book too! I've read it multiple times. What's your favorite thing about it?
I love the world building and the characters. It's so immersive and the characters are so well developed.
I agree! It's a really great book. I'm glad you're a fan.
Thanks! I'm glad to meet another fan.
Me too! Do you have any plans for the weekend?
I'm going to write for most of it, but I'm going to try to get out and enjoy the weather too.
That sounds like a good plan. I'm going to try to do some gardening and maybe go for a walk.
That sounds nice. I love gardening.
Me too! It's a great way to relax and get some exercise.
I agree! It's also a great way to get fresh air and sunshine.
Exactly! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests
